sqlMap.update:
update HR_MSC_MGW_TENDAM_FR_OPER
ARMNB_FALLBACKS = #armnbFallbacks:DECIMAL#
ARMNB_DROP_CALLS = #armnbDropCalls:DECIMAL#
ARMWB_FALLBKS = #armwbFallbks:DECIMAL#
ARMWB_DROP_CALLS = #armwbDropCalls:DECIMAL#
EFR_FALLBKS = #efrFallbks:DECIMAL#
EFR_DROP_CALLS = #efrDropCalls:DECIMAL#
ARMNB_NEGOTIAT = #armnbNegotiat:DECIMAL#
ARMNB_END_POIN_MODE = #armnbEndPoinMode:DECIMAL#
ARMWB_NEGOTIAT = #armwbNegotiat:DECIMAL#
ARMWB_END_POIN_MODE = #armwbEndPoinMode:DECIMAL#
EFR_NEGOTIAT = #efrNegotiat:DECIMAL#
EFR_END_POIN_MODE = #efrEndPoinMode:DECIMAL#

ARMNB_RENEGOTIAT = #armnbRenegotiat:DECIMAL#
ARMWB_ESTABS = #armwbEstabs:DECIMAL#

NEGOTIAT_SUCC_RATE_AMR_EFR = #negotiatSuccRateAmrEfr:DECIMAL#
SUCC_RATE_AMR_NB = #succRateAmrNb:DECIMAL#
where DAY = #day:DATE# and HOUR = #hour:DECIMAL# and MSCID = #mscid:VARCHAR#

update HR_MSC_MGW_TENDAM_FR_OPER set ARMNB_FALLBACKS = #armnbFallbacks:DECIMAL#, ARMNB_DROP_CALLS = #armnbDropCalls:DECIMAL#, ARMWB_FALLBKS = #armwbFallbks:DECIMAL#, ARMWB_DROP_CALLS = #armwbDropCalls:DECIMAL#, EFR_FALLBKS = #efrFallbks:DECIMAL#, EFR_DROP_CALLS = #efrDropCalls:DECIMAL#, ARMNB_NEGOTIAT = #armnbNegotiat:DECIMAL#, ARMNB_END_POIN_MODE = #armnbEndPoinMode:DECIMAL#, ARMWB_NEGOTIAT = #armwbNegotiat:DECIMAL#, ARMWB_END_POIN_MODE = #armwbEndPoinMode:DECIMAL#, EFR_NEGOTIAT = #efrNegotiat:DECIMAL#, EFR_END_POIN_MODE = #efrEndPoinMode:DECIMAL#, ARMNB_ESTABS = #armnbEstabs:DECIMAL#, ARMNB_REESTABS = #armnbReestabs:DECIMAL#, ARMNB_RENEGOTIAT = #armnbRenegotiat:DECIMAL#, ARMWB_ESTABS = #armwbEstabs:DECIMAL#, ARMWB_REESTABS = #armwbReestabs:DECIMAL#, ARMWB_RENEGOTIAT = #armwbRenegotiat:DECIMAL#, EFR_ESTABS = #efrEstabs:DECIMAL#, EFR_REESTABS = #efrReestabs:DECIMAL#, EFR_RENEGOTIAT = #efrRenegotiat:DECIMAL#, PCM_SUCC_RATE_AMR_NB = #pcmSuccRateAmrNb:DECIMAL#, PCM_SUCC_RATE_AMR_WB = #pcmSuccRateAmrWb:DECIMAL#, PCM_SUCC_RATE_AMR_EFR = #pcmSuccRateAmrEfr:DECIMAL#, NEGOTIAT_SUCC_RATE_AMR_NB = #negotiatSuccRateAmrNb:DECIMAL#, NEGOTIAT_SUCC_RATE_AMR_WB = #negotiatSuccRateAmrWb:DECIMAL#, NEGOTIAT_SUCC_RATE_AMR_EFR = #negotiatSuccRateAmrEfr:DECIMAL#, SUCC_RATE_AMR_NB = #succRateAmrNb:DECIMAL# where DAY = #day:DATE# and HOUR = #hour:DECIMAL# and MSCID = #mscid:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select * from HR_MSC_MGW_TENDAM_FR_OPER
MSCID like '%' || UPPER(#mscid:VARCHAR#) || '%'
DAY = #startDate#
HOUR >= #startHour#
HOUR <= #endHour#
order by DAY, HOUR, MSCID
